attributes.action: Spouse Visa: To lower income requirement (18,600) for those with a child/children
attributes.additional_details:
Action I would like to be taken:
For the Government to lower the income requirement (18,600) for those with a child/children.
It is alot harder for those Mothers having to work long hours whilst trying to raise their child, trying to also spend quality time with them.
The father should have rights too. The Mother is the foundation of the family but without a Father figure is not complete.
